                       double xLength,

                       double zLength,
                       double mass,
                       javax.media.j3d.Transform3D velocity,

Description copied from interface: PieceFactory
Creates a custom piece.

Specified by:
makePiece in interface PieceFactory
Parameters:
location - - location of the piece's bounding box's lower-left corner
radius - - radius of the piece
xLength - - x-dimension of the piece
yLength - - y-dimension of the piece
zLength - - z-dimension of the piece
mass - - mass of the piece
velocity - - velocity of the piece
COR - - coefficient of reflection of the piece
app - - appearance of the piece
isVisible - - whether this piece is visible or not
Returns:
a flipper with customized parameters.
